name: Salooner
description:
Pour the drink! Clink! 

You opened a cozy beverage bar in the wild west. Hand out your finest draft drinks, get new beverages, and hire more helping paws! 

Salooner is an idle clicker game, made at Tiny Demo Jam, 20th -22nd January 2023.

Joni Suojanen - Game Design & Programming

Jonathan Berglin - Programming

Ale Neppius - Game Graphics

Marija Šumarac - sound design

Chris Hong - User Interface & User Experience  Marija Šumarac - Sound Design
